You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &copy

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&COPY;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a9/index.htm U+000A9].
  * `&COPY` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a9/index.htm U+000A9].
  * `&copy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a9/index.htm U+000A9].
  * `&copy` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a9/index.htm U+000A9].
